plot: In London's bustling yet desolate Trafalgar Square, an ancient corpse meets a pigeon with a broken wing.
title: The Hungry Corpse
plot_es: In London's bustling yet desolate Trafalgar Square, an ancient corpse meets a pigeon with a broken wing.
plot_en: In London's bustling yet desolate Trafalgar Square, an ancient corpse meets a pigeon with a broken wing.
